scripts.demo: current_date=$(date +'%d.%m.%y') && current_time=$(date +'%H:%M') ; rm -rf ./dist && vite build && git add . && git commit --allow-empty -am "new build to publish on $current_date at $current_time" && git push origin --delete gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.demomaster: if git show-ref --quiet refs/heads/dist; then read -p 'Are you sure you want to run the demo script from master branch? [y/N]: ' confirm && [[ $confirm == [yY] ]] && git checkout dist && git merge master --no-edit && yarn demo && git checkout master || echo 'Aborted.'; else read -p 'The dist branch does not exist. Do you want to create it and run the demo script from master branch? [y/N]: ' confirm && [[ $confirm == [yY] ]] && git checkout -b dist && yarn demo && git checkout master || echo 'Aborted.'; fi
scripts.deploy: current_date=$(date +'%d.%m.%y') && current_time=$(date +'%H:%M') ; read -p 'Are you sure you want to deploy? (Y/N)' confirm && [[ $confirm =~ ^[Yy]$ ]] && current_date=$(date +'%d.%m.%y') && current_time=$(date +'%H:%M') && if git show-ref --quiet refs/heads/deploy; then git checkout deploy && git merge master --no-edit && node deploy/prepare_vite.js && yarn build && git add . && git commit --allow-empty -am 'new build to publish on $current_date at $current_time' && dist-to-sftp -f './.htaccess' && git checkout master; else echo 'The deploy branch does not exist. Aborted.'; fi
